title: The House of the Seven Gables - complex character

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Hawthorne uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complex character of Judge Pyncheon.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Hawthorne uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complex character of Judge Pyncheon.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
